body: This is so out of order - I've just got back on Avicus after being banned for 4 days, and now I've been banned for 2 months!? And I've done nothing! This is so out of order - apparently I got temp-banned for Excessive Caps and Rudeness - and all I said in the whole chat was "Defend!" once, with no caps! This is so wrong Avicus, and whoever banned me was wrong to do so as I have done nothing wrong - so now I can't play the best Minecraft Server for 2 months! Thanks a lot Avicus, see you whenever guys -_-

title: Oh My God!!!

replies.body: I understand this is annoying but you need to just be patient for their reply. Threads like this probably will not help your appeal.
